channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Detroit-Area Library Lets Man Keep Baseball Book 50 Years Overdue
item.description: Chuck Hildebrandt recently tried to return a book titled “Baseball’s Zaniest Stars” that he borrowed in 1974 when he was a 13-year-old “baseball nut.”

item.title: I make tiny models of beetles holding sex toys for a living
item.description: 'I’ll have bugs embracing their sexuality in a dirty scene,'

item.title: 12 drinks of Christmas from Brussels sprout gin to mince pie liqueur
item.description: From gingerbread espresso martinis to Christmas pud bottle, Mirror's Tash and Lydia try all the most festive booze on the market

item.title: Shop owner makes 50 citizen’s arrests because shoplifting at his store is so bad
item.description: Martin Gaunt fights back against retail crime through unexpected method

item.title: Snow maps show 22 counties across England set for bad weather this weekend
item.description: Brits hoping for a white Christmas will get an early sprinkling of snow in different parts of the country this weekend, according to new weather maps ...

item.title: Google Maps murder arrests after man caught on Street View 'bundling body into car'
item.description: Detectives investigating the disappearance of a man in Spain found images on Google Street View of what appeared to be a body being bundled into a car...

item.title: Zookeeper killed after being attacked by tiger when he left cage door open
'Teen daughters in our blended family at war but partner always sides with his child'
item.description: Coleen Nolan advises a divorced reader who is clashing with her new partner, who always lets his own child off lightly

item.title: Builders pour concrete over newly built bus stand and now nobody can use it
item.description: People are working out how to sit properly on the submerged seats.

item.title: We make 20,000 puds an hour in the world's oldest Christmas pudding factory
item.description: It’s been 125 years since it opened its doors, but the world’s oldest Christmas pudding maker is showing no sign of slowing down

item.title: Cop resigns after moonlighting as porn star to pay $500,000 bills
